points: Developed and maintained software applications using Elixir (Phoenix framework), PHP (Yii2 framework), HTML, SCSS, CSS, JavaScript, and other relevant technologies.
Implemented efficient data structures and algorithms, and wrote optimized SQL queries for PostgreSQL databases.
Worked with Dockerised environments, and applied DevOps practices such as CI/CD pipelines to deploy applications on AWS services like S3 bucket, Textract, and EC2 instances.

description: 22 weeks internship programme as a software engineer
points: Assisted in the development and maintenance of software applications using Bash, GitHub, macOS, WordPress, PHP, JavaScript, and Flutter.
Gained experience with Docker and other relevant technologies.

company_title: Diploma in Information Technology, Singapore Polytechnic, Singapore.
description: Specialised in UI/UX, Data Structure and Algorithms, and Software Development.
points: Completed modules in software development, data structures and algorithms, UI/UX, database management, DevOps, and more.
Contributed to extracurricular activities, serving as an active member of the Singapore Polytechnic Vocal Talent group and a sub-committee member of the Singapore Polytechnic Arts Council.
Successfully completed a Final Year Project on a Digital Service & Incentive Platform web application for Sentosa Singapore, earning third place recognition.
